sessions.title: Dataverse Essentials: Put Your Data into Action with Agents
sessions.desc:
This hands-on workshop explores how Dataverse, together with Microsoft Copilot Studio, Power Apps, and the Dataverse Model Context Protocol (MCP) server, provides the foundation for systems where people and AI collaborate across mission-critical workflows. You will build user facing tools and Copilot agents that solve real world problems using enterprise data for intelligent automation, contextual decision-making, and dynamic interactions. From modeling data schemas to building apps, to creating agents to streamline processes and improve productivity, you'll learn to build adaptive solutions ready for the AI era. Join us to discover how Dataverse powers the next generation of enterprise platforms—agile, intelligent, and built to evolve. 
  
 This workshop has had 2 previous titles: Dataverse Essentials: Enabling Citizen & Low-Code Makers to Build Your Next Scalable Business Apps - 2025 Edition & Dataverse Essentials: Dataverse for Agentic Digital Workforce

sessions.title: Lifecycle Mastery: Managing Power Platform Assets in the Age of Agents
sessions.desc:
As AI agents take center stage in Power Platform innovation, the need for robust, scalable, and secure application lifecycle management (ALM) has never been more critical. This hands-on workshop dives deep into how Managed Environments can help you master the lifecycle of apps, flows, and agents—ensuring governance and agility go hand in hand. 
  
 You'll learn how to implement modern ALM strategies using built-in features like solution-aware pipelines, environment routing, maker onboarding policies, and data loss prevention (DLP) enforcement—all designed to support a safe and streamlined deployment experience across the development lifecycle. 
  
 In this workshop, you'll:  
 - Explore how Managed Environments enhance ALM with policy-driven controls and telemetry  
 - Set up and use Power Platform Pipelines for secure, automated deployments  
 - Apply environment routing to guide apps and agents to the right zones  
 - Learn how ALM patterns extend to Copilot Studio agents and future AI workloads  
 - Get hands-on with solution packaging, approvals, and rollback strategies  
  
 Whether you're a Center of Excellence leader, IT admin, or solution architect, you'll leave with the tools and templates to implement lifecycle best practices that are agent-ready and enterprise-proven.

sessions.title: Plan, Build, and Evaluate Agentic Solutions That Fit YOUR Needs
sessions.desc:
Ready to unlock the power of agentic AI for your organization? This session is designed to be more than an overview of agent creation tools. This full day workshop aims to explore how we, as individuals, teams and organizations, can strategically assess our agent use cases, intuitively build and equip agents with the best tools, and learn ways to evaluate their effectiveness and ROI. 
  
 Bring your laptops and experience demos, hands-on activities and engaging discussions, where you’ll apply design-thinking frameworks like the AI adoption journey map, Human-agent collaboration approach, and transformative value evaluation. Additionally, you will also practice latest agent building tools and features available in Power Platform and Copilot Studio. 
  
 This workshop is for everyone who is curious about agents–no matter their level of experience or stage of adoption. Attendees will leave with tangible resources and actionable insights to assess, build and evaluate agents tailored to unique needs, while gaining a fresh perspective on how design thinking supports a more strategic, intentional and successful AI adoption.

list.name: Samantha Neufeld
list.title: Principal User Research Manager, Power Platform
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Automating Business Processes with Cloud Flows and AI in 2025 Hands-on Workshop
sessions.desc:
Power Automate cloud flows are the most popular type of flow in Microsoft Power Automate and in 2025 they became even more powerful with new AI capabilities to take your business process automation to the next level. In this hands-on workshop, you will learn how to automate business processes by creating cloud flows in a hands-on approach! 
  
 We will start by learning the fundamental concepts of Power Automate, and then we will learn how to create flows starting from a template. We will then create our own flows, based on real world examples! Throughout the workshop, each flow will take it one level further and we will learn how to create approvals, conditions, how to use expressions and loops, as well as how to integrate our flows with Microsoft Teams, and handle errors in our cloud flows! We will also cover Copilot and how to infuse AI capabilities such as the AI Builder and Generative Actions into your cloud flows! 
  
 This is your chance to learn how to automate your own business processes with Power Automate cloud flows and understand all the different controls available in cloud flows!

sessions.title: The Developer's Path to AI: Mastering Copilot Agent Development with Pro-Code and Low-Code
sessions.desc:
This intensive workshop bridges the gap between traditional software development and AI agent engineering, designed specifically for professional developers wanting to expand their skill sets. 
  
 Led by industry experts Scott Durow, Cameron Vetter, and Sheila Shahpari, participants will gain mastery in building intelligent Copilot agents using both pro-code and low-code approaches within the Microsoft ecosystem.

list.name: Scott Durow
list.title: Microsoft Business Applications MVP | Co-founder & Technical Architect
list.label: Speaker

list.name: Cameron Vetter
list.title: AI Practice Director / Microsoft MVP Azure AI Foundry
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Custom Connectors Masterclass
sessions.desc:
In the Power Platform there are more than 1400 connectors available out of the box. This is a huge amount and offers you great functionality from the get-go. But what if you need to connect to a data source or a service that is not available in the Power Platform? Or what if you want to customize the functionality or the user interface of an existing connector? This is where custom connectors come in. Custom connectors are the superheroes of the Power Platform, because they allow you to extend its capabilities and create unique and tailored solutions. 
  
 In this workshop, you will learn all about custom connectors, why they are the superheroes of the Power Platform, how you can easily build them and enhance your experience in the Power Platform. As a bonus – you will also learn about the new AI capabilities within custom connectors. 
  
 By the end of this workshop, you will be able to: 
  
 ▶️ Understand what custom connectors are and how they work 
 ▶️ Identify the scenarios where custom connectors are useful and beneficial 
 ▶️ Create a custom connector from scratch using the Power Platform portal 
 ▶️ Test and troubleshoot your custom connector 
 ▶️ Use your custom connector in Power Apps, Power Automate & Copilot Studio 
 ▶️ Share your custom connector with others and publish it to the Power Platform 
  
 The workshop will be divided into four sections: 
  
 1️⃣ Section 1: Introduction to Custom Connectors 
 2️⃣ Section 2: Building a Custom Connector from Scratch 
 3️⃣ Section 3: Testing and Troubleshooting a Custom Connector 
 4️⃣ Section 4: Top tips and tricks for Custom Connectors 
  
 Each section will include a presentation, a demonstration, and a hands-on exercise. You will need a laptop, an internet connection, and a Power Platform account to participate in the workshop.

sessions.title: Power Platform Governance: One Workshop to Rule Them All!
sessions.desc:
One governance strategy to rule them all, one framework to guide them, one workshop to bring them all and in best practices bind them! 
  
 Power Platform governance doesn’t have to be a battle against chaos—if you have the right tools and strategies in place. Whether you're just starting or refining your approach, this hands-on workshop will equip you with the skills to balance control and innovation across your organization. 
  
 Join Lindsay and Nat for a deep dive into governance best practices, where we’ll tackle: 
  
 ? DLP Policies – Protecting your data without frustrating your makers 
 ? Environment Strategy – Creating environments with purpose 
 ? Security Roles & Groups – Who gets access to what (and how to keep it that way) 
 ? Default Environment Cleanup – Because we all know it’s gotten out of hand 
 ? Adoption Strategies – Encouraging innovation while staying secure 
 ? The COE Starter Kit & Managed Environments – Automating governance so you don’t have to babysit every app 
 ? Pipelines – How to manage solution deployment like a pro 
 ? Admin Center vs. COE vs. Managed Environments – When to use what (no more guessing!) 
 ? Governance Tiers Tips – Light, intermediate, or heavy? Find the right governance model for your org  
  
 This interactive, hands-on workshop will leave you with an actionable governance plan—whether you’re wrangling an existing Power Platform landscape or setting up fresh guardrails for future success.  
  
 Governance doesn’t have to be a mystery. Let’s make sure you leave with a strategy that works!

sessions.title: Copilot Studio in a Day
sessions.desc:
This immersive, full-day workshop is your fast track to mastering the art of building, managing, and scaling agents using Microsoft Copilot Studio. Whether you're just getting started or looking to sharpen your skills, this hands-on experience will equip you with everything you need to create powerful, purpose-driven agents to deliver real business value. 
   
 What to expect:    
 Foundations of Copilot Studio: Understand the platform, its capabilities, and how it fits into the Microsoft ecosystem, including Microsoft 365 Copilot.   
 Agent Design & Build: Learn how to create agents that solve real problems using natural language, knowledge, tools, data connectors, and autonomous capabilities.   
 Best Practices for Deployment: Explore governance, security, and lifecycle management for enterprise-ready agents.   
 Performance & Optimization: Monitor, troubleshoot, and continuously improve your agents using analytics and feedback loops.   
 Throughout the day, you’ll build your own agents, test them in real scenarios, and leave with a working prototype you can take back to your team

sessions.title: Get Hands-on with Intelligent Apps and Agents
sessions.desc: Get hands-on with intelligent apps and agents — AI agents are transforming how organizations automate tasks, guide users, and solve problems. Step into the future of low-code innovation with this workshop, bringing together the best of the Power Apps and the new frontier of AI agents.  In this immersive full-day experience you’ll learn how to build an end-to-end modern business solution from the ground up. You'll work alongside agents to make you more productive and create tools fully powered by agents to make your users more productive as well!  Designed for makers, developers, and architects alike, this 200-level workshop is your launchpad into scalable, secure, and intelligent solution development that leverage the latest in AI-powered tools across the platform. This workshop will show you not just how to build apps—but an entire solution that's smarter, proactive, and agent-ready.  You’ll walk away with:  - A plan for a rich, fully functional business solution built with Power Apps  - Your first AI agent designed and deployed using Copilot Studio  - An understanding of how to connect agents to your apps and data  - Insights on when to use apps, when to use agents—and when to use both together  Whether you’re just getting started or looking to evolve your low-code practice, this is your opportunity to build the next generation of solutions—all in a single day.    Previously Titled: Next-Gen in a Day: Creating Solutions with Apps and AI Agents

list.name: Tasha Scott
list.title: Maker, Senior Product Manager, Power Apps Studio
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Building Intelligent AI Solutions with Copilot Studio & Azure AI
sessions.desc:
In this hands-on workshop, participants will learn how to design, build, and deploy AI-powered solutions using Copilot Studio and Azure AI Services. 
  
 By the end of the session, attendees will have practical experience in setting up AI workflows, implementing Azure AI Search, utilizing speech-to-text processing, and leveraging Azure Document Intelligence. This workshop provides a step-by-step approach to integrating AI capabilities, enabling participants to build intelligent and automated solutions efficiently.

sessions.title: Safe to Scale: Power Platform Governance and Security in the Age of AI Agents
sessions.desc:
The rise of AI agents built with Power Platform introduces incredible potential—and critical responsibility. As organizations embrace autonomous solutions, ensuring enterprise-grade governance, security, and visibility has never been more important. 
 In this hands-on workshop, you’ll learn how the fully Managed Platform provides the foundational controls you need to safely scale both traditional low-code apps and emerging AI agents. extensions.

sessions.title: Beginners Guide to Power BI and Microsoft Fabric Workshop
sessions.desc:
This session will provide you with the knowledge that you need to quickly become productive using Power BI and Microsoft Fabric. 
  
 First, you will be introduced to Power BI: 
 - Power BI licensing 
 - Power BI Components 
 - Using the Power BI Desktop app 
 - Using the Power BI Service 
 - How to create reports and dashboards 
 - Learning Resources 
  
 Then, you'll explore Microsoft Fabric: 
 - What is Fabric and why should you care? 
 - Basic Fabric concepts and components 
 - OneLake and Lakehouses 
 - Dataflows and data pipelines 
 - And more! 
  
 Don't have a Power BI or Fabric license? You can start using Power BI and Fabric for free! 
  
 Attend this demo-rich session and get started with Power BI and Microsoft Fabric!

sessions.title: All-In! A Deep-Dive On Model-Driven Power Apps
sessions.desc:
Do you want to dive-into Dataverse and master building model driven apps? Does your company want to move away from managing important business processes in Excel spreadsheets? And are you interested in how to make an AI-enabled solution that delivers real value? 
  
 Whether you are a complete beginner, or you have made a few apps before this is the class for you. In this hands-on workshop you will learn to build scalable, secure model-driven apps your users will love. We will teach you our method for designing apps and give you a deeper understanding of Dataverse 
  
 Topics Include: 
  
 Data-Model Design: understand how to fit your company data to Dataverse tables, column types and relationships 
  
 Views, Forms, Charts & Dashboards: deliver intuitive app designs that get results by following UX best practices 
  
 Security Modelling: create the appropriate security to ensure users only see the data they need 
  
 Automation + Integration: building dataverse automations to support business processes and options for connecting to other online services 
  
 Copilot: learn how to make the most of the latest AI features

sessions.title: 007 Agent Series: Using AI to Streamline Power Pages Development
sessions.desc:
Mission Briefing: 
  
 Welcome, Agent. Your mission is to harness AI-driven development to streamline Power Pages workflows using VS Code Copilot. Execute tasks faster, code smarter, design with precision, and elevate your brand with AI-generated content. 
  
 Learning Objectives 
  
 1. AI-Driven Content Generation 
 Leverage AI to create compelling web content, forms, and instructional text, enhancing user engagement and efficiency. 
  
 2. Branding with AI Assistance 
 Use AI to maintain brand consistency, generate on-brand messaging, and create visually cohesive elements for your Power Pages. 
  
 3. AI-Optimized Liquid Templating 
 Copilot enhances Liquid templates with AI-driven suggestions, improving efficiency and reducing development time. 
  
 4. Accelerated JavaScript Development 
 Speed up form validation, event handling, and debugging with Copilot’s predictive coding capabilities. 
  
 5. AI-Powered JavaScript Insights 
 Gain deep understanding of JavaScript with AI explanations to modify and troubleshoot code effectively. 
  
 6. Seamless HTML Integration 
 Utilize Copilot to integrate HTML with Bootstrap v3 or v5 for responsive, visually appealing designs. 
  
 7. Optimized Web API Calls 
 Streamline API calls for seamless external data integration and automated workflows. 
  
 Mission Outcome: 
  
 Master these AI-driven techniques to revolutionize Power Pages development, enhance content strategy, and strengthen branding. Accept the mission. Deploy AI. Transform your workflow. 
  
 Are you ready, Agent?

list.name: Victor Dantas
list.title: Microsoft MVP | Power Platform Architect, 365 Saturday Ambassador, Speaker
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: The Power Platform Fundamentals Workshop: Prep for the PL-900 Certification!
sessions.desc:
I went to Las Vegas and all I got was my PL-900 certification... 
  
 So you somehow landed into the world of building low-code, no-code applications with something called 'The Power Platform'. 
  
 You're travelling to Las Vegas to attend the biggest conference hoping to learn as much as possible. Where to begin? What topics are important? What is a Power App? How do I get to the Dataverse? What does it mean to "Flow"? 
  
 Let's start your conference experience on the the right foot with a full day Power Platform fundamentals workshop. 
  
 We'll cover the basics; data modelling, application building, automation, dashboards, and of course, Artificial Intelligence! 
  
 This workshop will cover the basics of Power Apps, Power Automate, Dataverse, Power FX, Copilot Studio, and much more. 
  
 Once you have this foundation, you'll not only be able to better successfully navigate the amazing Power Platform community conference but also have the knowledge and skills to write the PL-900 Power Platform fundamentals certification exam.

sessions.title: My First Day of Power Platform (Powered by Copilot)
sessions.desc:
Are you new to the Power Platform and not sure where to start? In this hands-on workshop, you’ll discover how Power Platform, combined with the game-changing capabilities of Copilot, can transform your approach to business solutions. Whether you're a beginner or just need a clearer roadmap, this session is designed to help you dive into the platform with confidence. 
  
 We’ll walk through the entire journey from idea generation to execution, using real-world scenarios to explore how Copilot can assist in every step. Together, we'll use natural language to map business problems to actionable solutions, then roll up our sleeves to build with Copilot. 
  
 You’ll also get hands-on practice in using Copilot to assist with envisioning and planning your solutions, removing the overwhelm often felt when first encountering Power Platform. By the end of this workshop, you'll have practical experience and a strong foundation to launch your Power Platform journey. Plus, you’ll be equipped with strategies and tips to make the most of your time at the event and in your future development path. 
  
 Join us for this targeted, one-day workshop and walk away with the skills, confidence, and mindset you need to kickstart your Power Platform journey.

sessions.title: Microsoft Fabric for the Power BI Professional
sessions.desc:
This full-day session delivers a practical, high-level introduction to Microsoft Fabric - what it is, how it works, and how to unlock its value. Tailored for Power BI professionals, Microsoft 365 practitioners, and data enthusiasts, the session offers a guided overview of the unified data platform for AI transformation. 
  
 Through expert-led demonstrations and interactive discussions, presenters from the Microsoft Fabric Customer Advisory Team (CAT) will showcase how Fabric integrates with Power BI and Microsoft 365 to support scalable, secure, and collaborative data projects. 
  
 What you’ll learn: 
 How Microsoft Fabric is structured - and how to explain it to others 
  
 Where Fabric fits for Power BI creators, M365 admins, and data teams 
  
 What OneLake is, and why it’s more than “just a data lake” 
  
 When to use different data stores (OLAP, OLTP, Real-Time, and more) 
  
 How governance, security, and licensing shape real-world implementations 
  
 If you're looking for a clear, detailed perspective on Microsoft Fabric, this session is for you.

sessions.title: Power Fx Deep Dive: From Novice to Ninja!
sessions.desc:
Step into the transformative world of Power Fx, the backbone of Microsoft's low-code business applications platform. At this all-day workshop, attendees will not just dabble but dive deep into the nooks and crannies of this Excel-like language, mastering its capabilities, nuances, and potential. 
   
 Power Fx is used across the entire Power Platform, meaning it's vital for developers to understand the foundational elements of the language and see how this can be applied in real-world scenarios. During this all-day workshop, we'll see how Power Fx can be used within Canvas Power Apps and as part of model-driven Power Apps, plug-ins and Copilot Studio agents. Attendees will learn from various hands-on activities and demos, better understanding the common pitfalls and how to sidestep them in a project.   
   
 In a world where digital transformations are taking center stage, and the line between developer and non-developer continues to blur, our workshop suits both new and experienced attendees. It will provide a forum for active participation, ensuring that every attendee is more than just a spectator. Join us in exploring and unlocking the massive potential of Power Fx!   
   
 Key Takeaways  
   
 •	Familiarize yourself with the key functions and formulas you need to know in Power Fx  
 •	See how Power Fx can be leveraged end-to-end when building canvas Power Apps  
 •	Gain some inspiration on how to apply Power Fx in the context of Microsoft Dataverse and in model-driven Power Apps  
 •	Appreciate the other areas of the platform where Power Fx can be freely used today, such as Power Automate desktop flows, Copilot Studio agents and Power Pages sites.

sessions.title: Recipes for Success: How to Prepare, Cook, and Serve Custom Agents
sessions.desc:
Ever dreamed of having your own digital minion to do your bidding? Strap in, because Dian and David are about to take you on a wild ride into the world of agents! In this workshop, they’ll crack open the secrets of building custom agents in Copilot Studio—no PhD in robotics required. You’ll learn how to get an agent up and running in minutes (yes, minutes!), simply by feeding it some knowledge. Then, they’ll show you how to create topics and actions, making your bot smart enough to actually do things instead of just staring blankly at your customers. 
  
 By the end of this session, you’ll be ready to unleash your own agents, dazzle your coworkers, and maybe even convince your boss that you deserve a raise for automating half your job. 
  
 IMPORTANT: Please bring your own laptop and charger for the hands-on components. If your work laptop is locked down with a lot of security, please bring a personal laptop.

sessions.title: Power Platform AI Quest
sessions.desc:
From the creators of Power Platformers: Fusion Quest, comes the new Power Platform AI Quest a workshop like no other. 
  
 Join us for a day of learning as you complete a series of AI quests designed to challenge and grow your Power Platform AI skills as an architect, maker, or as a developer. Skills that go beyond building a Copilot, skills that can be applied to all parts of your work. 
  
 This is NOT your typical workshop where you listen all day, or follow the instructor, or repeat click after click in the exercise instructions. In this workshop you participate solo as well as in groups to achieve greatness. We need attendees of different skills as we use a combination of business knowledge, maker creativity, data appreciation, and cunning development, done in teams. Pro-code, low-code, no-code. ALL THE CODES are welcome. Come join us to collaborate, create, and conquer challenges with the finesse of a seasoned adventurer. 
  
 Teams will tackle real world scenarios to architect and implement AI solutions. Learn how to make AI work with your fusion team from crafting intelligent prompts to building fancy Copilot extensions. Challenge yourself to go beyond just Copilot only solutions and leave this workshop with new skills, fresh ideas, and a vision for how AI can transform not just your work, but your entire approach to problem-solving that you can apply immediately.

sessions.title: Unleash Your Inner App-Builder: Create a Fully-Functional Inventory Management App in One Day!
sessions.desc:
Let's build an app. We are going to start with a blank white screen and we are going to build a complete app from end to end. This give us the ability to talk about all of the pieces of the puzzle along the way. 
  
 We will use the scenario of an Inventory Management App but if that isn't your jam, don't get too hung up on it. Why? Because the app and data patterns are the same as we use for 100s of other scenarios. Parent/Child data, working with files, building a decent looking UI, and more are all covered along the way. I have literally built 1000s of apps and taught millions of people, so I am looking forward to teaching you. 
  
 And the goal is to try to make this session approachable for both new and experienced builders. As long as you have built and app or two before you should be able to follow along. And speaking of follow along, this is not a guided lab and doesn't include any step-by-step guides. This is just you, me, and a few hundred of your newest friends working together to plan, design, and build an app. 
  
 The working app will be available for download after the session for you, so you can copy the code directly from the app. 
  
 Come join me for a fun filled day of building and giveaways.

sessions.title: Prompt-A-Thon: Your Circus, Your Monkeys!
sessions.desc:
Your data is indeed your circus and all the potential AI scenarios are indeed your monkeys!  
  
 Learn how to wrangle them at this PromptAThon. Ever heard of a PromptAThon? WELL, it’s a real thing! We decided to merge the hackathon concept with the art of prompting! If you would like to hone your prompting skills, work with a team, be creative, and a little bit competitive then this is for you. Come and take on a creative scenario where you will learn exactly how Copilot(s) can help you in your day-to-day, through the art of prompting  
  
 The promptathon is for everyone! You do NOT need to be technical. If you know how to write sentences in natural language, this ones for you. We cater for anyone and everyone. Bring your skills no matter what your role is. You will be using various copilots to complete challenges, build cool things and create amazing designs. We want YOU to build and share your prompts with the world, so please join us. Build amazing designs in designer, create epic word documents and power points with copilot for M365, do research and get information with Microsoft copilot and build apps, automations and custom copilots with the tools in the Power platform….. but using prompts as much as you possibly can. The goal here is to tell a story and show your working prompts.  
  
 What should you bring on the day: 
 1. Yourself 
 2. Your laptop, no laptops will be provided 
 3. Excitement and creativity 
 4. If possible, we would prefer you to use your own M365 Copilot licenses and your own tenant, however if this is NOT possible we will pair you with people who have their own M365 copilot licenses.  
  
 A point to make is NOT every scenario you come up with will require M365 Copilot. You can be as creative as you like :)

sessions.title: RPA in a Day
sessions.desc: The hands-on, step-by-step lab exercises guide you through building a modern end to end business scenario to automate across systems that don't have APIs. Inside the labs, you will use Power Automate capabilities such as Power Automate for Desktop, API connectors, AI actions and more to automate a business process.

sessions.title: Deploying Copilot Studio-Built Agents Org-Wide: Step-by-Step Walkthrough and Lifecycle Management
sessions.desc: Congratulations! You've built and tested your Agent in Copilot Studio and are ready to publish it for your organization's users. There's more to it than just hitting the Publish button, especially if you want to properly manage the lifecycle of your Agent as an app. You will undoubtedly be making fixes to the Agent, adding new functionality and more, and you need to be able to streamline the process of rolling out new versions. And then there's the matter of security and who the Agent will be available to. In this session, you will get a step-by-step walkthrough of this process with attention to details.

sessions.title: Agents vs. Flows: Navigating the Future of Intelligent Automation
sessions.desc: In this session, we'll explore the evolving landscape of automation within the Power Platform ecosystem. As AI Agents gain prominence and promise to revolutionize automation creation, we'll examine how they compare to traditional RPA bots and cloud workflows.    Attendees will gain insights into:  * The similarities and differences between AI Agents and deterministic flows  * When to leverage deterministic flows for static processes and logic-driven tasks  * Optimal scenarios for implementing AI Agents to enhance automation intelligence  * Strategies for integrating both approaches to maximize efficiency and expand automation capabilities  * Reevaluating existing automations to incorporate new technologies effectively    Whether you're a seasoned automation expert or new to the field, this session will equip you with the knowledge to balance hype with practical application, ensuring you choose the right tool for each automation challenge.

list.name: Joel Lindstrom
list.title: 14-Time Former Microsoft MVP | Senior Director of Power Platform, Low-Code & Automation, Fast Track Recognized Solution Architect
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: 10 Tips to Plan for a Successful Power Pages Project
sessions.desc: Join Business Applications MVP Nicholas Hayduk of Engineered Code as he shares his experiences implementing Power Pages. Nick will cover his favorite tips he uses to help people all over the world succeed with their Pages projects, including what skills you need from project team members, where to find the best training resources, and how to avoid common pitfalls. This session is great for those just getting started with Power Pages, and for those experienced with other parts of Microsoft’s Power Platform. You’ll leave with a solid understanding of how to run a successful Power Pages implementation, start to finish.

list.name: Nikita Polyakov
list.title: Principal PM for Power Pages CAT
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: 5 Ways to Leverage Power Pages VS Code Copilot to Increase Productivity
sessions.desc: This session focuses on harnessing the power of Power Pages VS Code Copilot to enhance productivity in five key ways:    Efficient Liquid Templating: Learn how to optimize Liquid templating for Power Pages using VS Code Copilot's AI-driven suggestions, streamlining the development process.    Accelerated JavaScript Development: Discover how to expedite JavaScript development tasks, such as form validation, by leveraging Copilot's code suggestions tailored to Power Pages projects.    Enhanced Understanding of JavaScript: Utilize Copilot's AI explanations to gain deeper insights into JavaScript code, empowering you to troubleshoot and customize functionalities effectively.    Seamless HTML Integration: Create HTML code seamlessly integrated with Bootstrap v3 or v5 with the assistance of Copilot, ensuring a responsive and visually appealing design for your Power Pages.    Optimized Web API Calls: Explore how Copilot can facilitate the creation of efficient Power Pages web API calls, enabling smoother integration with external data sources and services.    By mastering these five strategies, attendees will unlock the full potential of Power Pages VS Code Copilot, revolutionizing their productivity in Power Pages development.

list.name: Victor Dantas
list.title: Microsoft MVP | Power Platform Architect, 365 Saturday Ambassador, Speaker
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Build Your Own M365 Copilot Reporting Dashboard
sessions.desc: Using Power Automate, Dataverse, Microsoft Graph, and Power BI - you can build your own usage reporting dashboard that shows you MUCH more than what you can get out of the box!   Want to drill down by manager? You can! Want to see which job titles are getting the most usage? Sure! What about a leaderboard of top Copilot users in the entire organization? It's all possible with this dashboard solution.    We don't just cover the theoretical here: we will also share lessons learned from implementing the Copilot Dashboard in a global organization with almost 1k Copilot users. This Copilot Reporting Dashboard can be a valuable tool for starting conversations with stakeholders, figuring out which groups to focus on, measuring growth after trainings, and proving business value to leadership, all of which we will discuss in this session.

sessions.title: Choosing the Right Power App Type: Model-Driven vs. Canvas
sessions.desc: Dive into the essential differences between model-driven apps and canvas apps in this focused session. We'll cover the key features and functionalities of each app type, emphasizing their suitability for varying business needs and user experiences.    Participants will be introduced to an assessment matrix, a valuable tool designed to streamline the decision-making process. This matrix compares factors such as app purpose, user roles, data complexity, and customization needs, guiding you to determine the best fit for your project objectives. sessions.title: Deep-Dive into Power Platform Managed Security
sessions.desc: Keeping track of sensitive data storage locations and diagnosing issues without proper tracing is challenging. Low-code platforms like Power Platform enable users to automate data flows easily, increasing the risk of losing control over sensitive data and facilitating data exfiltration.    Power Platform addresses these challenges through standardized monitoring and security features, making activities within applications more transparent compared to traditional black-box systems.    In this session, we will review native Power Platform logs and explore methods for analyzing telemetry data. The discussion will cover both operational monitoring, such as health metrics and troubleshooting, as well as security-focused topics including log collection, alerting, and incident response. We will demonstrate native integrations of Power Platform with Azure Application Insights (usage monitoring), Microsoft Purview (log collection and compliance management) and Microsoft Sentinel (threat detection and incident response).

sessions.title: Advanced PCFs in Power Pages
sessions.desc: Power Pages is a fantastic solution for building websites in the PowerApps world, but there are times when you may want functionality that can only be achieved through custom components, made with modern web development tools. In this session, we'll walk through PCFs, how they can be used on Power Pages, and a bit of basic React to get you started on taking your Power Pages sites to exciting new places.    What You'll Learn and Do  • Basic PCF Development: We'll cover the basics of PCF development, including a component working in React  • PCFs on Power Pages: We'll discuss the intricacies of getting PCFs into Power Pages, including all the configuration steps you'll need    What You'll Walk Away With  • Hands-on knowledge on how to build custom components that integrate into Power Pages sites    Who Should Attend  • Intermediate to advanced Power Pages developers who are curious just how far the platform can go  • Developers who already have a working knowledge of PCF components

sessions.title: The Customer-Facing Duo of the Decade: Custom Copilot with Power Pages
sessions.desc: Elevate your portal to new heights in this high-energy, high-ROI session combining Power Pages and Copilot Studio. These tools are often approached as separate topics, but Sean and Franco will showcase how to combine them to give your customers a wonderfully personal experience when they visit your website.    You’ll walk away from this session ready to implement an AI chatbot on your website, talking to your data, with minimal use of your time. Cut out more clicks, frustration and staff time than you ever dreamt possible.    What we’ll cover:    - OOTB Portals chatbot integration and generative search with demos using SharePoint and Dataverse    - The “gotchas” and “Oh I wish I knew that beforehand” limitations of Copilot Studio    - Little tweaks that maximize value    - How to extend and push the boundaries leveraging Power Automate and Azure AI Foundry    - How to tie in knowledge, document gathering and automation

list.name: Franco Musso
list.title: Freelance Power Pages specialist with an unhealthy obsession for experimenting, learning and empowering others
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Building Intelligent Agreement Agents with Docusign
sessions.desc: Unlock the power of the DocuSign Intelligent Agreement Management platform with Microsoft Power Platform and Copilot Studio. Learn how to build intelligent, context-aware automation that streamlines workflows, reduces manual tasks, and drives faster business outcomes—no heavy development required.

sessions.title: Frontier First: Your Copilot Era Starts with You
sessions.desc:
Rethink. Reimagine. Reinvent. 
    
  Everyone’s talking about AI. But few are building with it. 
    
  To lead in this new era, you can’t just implement Copilot - you need to be the first to experience it, challenge it, break it, and reimagine with it. This session dives into what it really means to operate as Customer Zero - leading with transformation before you prescribe it to your customers or teams. 
    
  The next generation of organizations - the Frontier Firm - is already emerging. Powered by humans + agents, fueled by data, and accelerated by Copilot, these companies scale faster, move with agility, and generate value in entirely new ways. The question isn’t if this frontier is coming. It’s: will you be one? 
    
  We'll explore how the most forward-thinking organizations are: 
  Enriching employee experiences by building Copilot into daily workflows 
  Reimagining customer engagement by building agentic AI experiences with Copilot Studio 
  Reshaping business processes through low-code innovation 
  Bending the curve on innovation through hands-on, iterative experimentation 
    
  It’s not about checklists or certifications. It’s about becoming AI-first by leaning in and using it yourself - now. You’ll leave with a clearer picture of what’s possible with Microsoft Copilot, Copilot Studio, and a roadmap to start your own frontier journey. 
    
  Join us, and let’s go from imagining to engineering.

sessions.title: From Pilot to Enterprise: Governing Copilot Studio Agents at Scale
sessions.desc: Moving from a small pilot to enterprise-wide adoption of Copilot Studio agents requires more than enthusiasm; it demands governance at scale. In this session, we’ll explore how to establish the guardrails, policies, and monitoring needed to enable innovation without compromising security or compliance. Learn how to design an environment strategy, enforce DLP, and implement lifecycle management to keep agent sprawl, data exposure, and cost overruns in check. We’ll cover practical steps for transitioning from proof-of-concept to production, including governance models, risk mitigation strategies, and monitoring practices that ensure responsible AI use. Whether you’re an IT leader, solution architect, or governance professional, you’ll leave with an actionable roadmap for balancing agility with control as you scale Copilot Studio agents across your organization.   Short Teaser Ready to scale your Copilot Studio agents from pilot to enterprise? This session shows you how to implement governance frameworks that enable innovation while maintaining security and compliance. Learn best practices for environment strategy, DLP, monitoring, and lifecycle management—so you can prevent agent sprawl, control costs, and protect sensitive data as you expand AI across your organization. Learning Objectives · Understand the key governance challenges organizations face when scaling Copilot Studio agents from pilot projects to enterprise-wide adoption. · Learn how to design and implement governance frameworks that include environment strategy, DLP policies, and lifecycle management for Copilot Studio agents. · Gain practical insights into monitoring and compliance controls to prevent agent sprawl, manage costs, and protect sensitive data at scale. · Develop an actionable roadmap for balancing innovation with security and compliance as you expand AI agent usage across the organization. Target Audience • IT Leaders and Administrators • Power Platform Solution Architects • Governance and Compliance Professionals

list.name: Norm Young
list.title: Microsoft 365 and Power Platform Solution Architect | Microsoft MVP
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Transforming Tax with AI: Reimagining the Tax Lifecycle with Power Platform & Copilot Studio
sessions.desc: Tax and Finance teams face mounting pressure to navigate planning, compliance, reporting, and controversy—amid fragmented data, manual processes, and a constantly shifting regulatory landscape. The consequences? Missed deadlines, limited visibility, and reactive decisions that hinder strategic progress. This session explores how agentic AI—combined with Microsoft technologies like Power Platform, M365, and Copilot Studio—can turn these challenges into opportunities for transformation.    Discover how autonomous agents can streamline workflows, proactively surface insights, and unify tax’s intricate ecosystem of data sources, calculation engines, and documents. We’ll walk through the architecture and development of a scalable solution that’s already supporting global clients.    If you're looking to modernize tax operations and unlock the full potential of AI, this session is for you.

list.name: Deepak Shrivastava
list.title: Sr Manager Tax Technology and Transformation
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Autonomy in Action: Building Intelligent Inventory Agents with Microsoft Copilot Studio
sessions.desc: Inventory management is often reactive—teams scramble to reorder stock after it’s already low, risking delays and missed opportunities. What if your system could anticipate needs and guide decisions before issues arise? In this session, you’ll learn how to build autonomous agents using Microsoft Copilot Studio that proactively monitor inventory levels, forecast demand, and recommend reorder quantities—all delivered directly in Microsoft Teams.     We’ll walk through the architecture and development process behind an intelligent inventory agent built by EY, show how it leverages the Power Platform, and demonstrate it live in action. Whether you're a maker, developer, or architect, this session will equip you to move beyond automation and into true autonomy.

list.name: Mike Collins
list.title: Sr Manager Consulting – FoP Technologies & Platform
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Reimagining Business Transformation: Harnessing Power Platform and Copilot Studio for SAP Integration and More
sessions.desc: Step into the future of enterprise transformation at the Power Platform Community Conference. This session explores how Copilot Studio empowers organizations to extend and enhance core platforms such as SAP, Workday, ServiceNow and Salesforce. Discover how Copilot Studio, working alongside Power Platform, enables non-technical users to build dynamic, scalable solutions that complement existing enterprise systems. Real-time, AI-powered access to customer and business data elevates service and drives satisfaction. Learn how to automate critical finance, HR and IT workflows and streamline front-line workloads, with AI-infused Power Apps for robust solutions across desktop, tablet and mobile. Through conversational interfaces and innovative orchestration, you’ll see how Copilot Studio and AI Builder can make ERP and enterprise interactions smarter and more intuitive.   Why attend  Expert insights   Gain practical guidance from HCLTech digital transformation leaders and system integration specialists.   Actionable strategies   Take away proven methods to enhance, expand and future-proof your SAP, Workday, ServiceNow and Salesforce environments.   Networking opportunities   Connect with industry peers and thought leaders to share ideas and experiences.   Future-ready skills   Build hands-on knowledge and practical tools to drive innovation, agility and efficiency in your organization using the latest from Power Platform and Copilot Studio. Join us to explore what’s possible at the intersection of AI, automation and enterprise technology and get ready to lead the next wave of digital transformation.

sessions.title: Unlock Data Intelligence with Azure Databricks Connector for Power Platform
sessions.desc: This session explores how the Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can be seamlessly integrated with Microsoft Power Platform to maximize data-driven decision-making. By leveraging the Azure Databricks connector with Power Apps, Power Automate, and Copilot Studio, organizations can create intelligent workflows, build custom applications, and enhance productivity through AI-powered copilots.

sessions.title: Accelerating the Power Platform in Highly Regulated Industries:  Composable Low-Code Case Studies
sessions.desc: This session explores how highly regulated organizations modernize their processes using Microsoft Power Platform. We’ll showcase customer examples from Insurance to Medical Device Manufacturing delivered with Power Apps and Dataverse to accelerate growth while maintaining compliance. Co-presented by the RSM team behind the projects, the session will walk through the journey from a single-line, hardcoded legacy system to a multi-line, configuration-driven platform that scales. Through a live demo and architecture deep-dive, attendees will learn how low-code solutions can meet strict industry regulations, see key features in action (e.g. integrated barcode scan

sessions.title: Extending Investments with Power Platform & AI: The Hobart Service Story
sessions.desc: Demonstrate how Microsoft’s Power Platform can extend existing investments in enterprise systems and how AI-driven automation delivers significant business value. Jon will share Hobart’s firsthand experience leveraging Power Platform and AI to maximize ROI on their recent technology investments, while Ben will provide context and technical insights.

list.name: Ben Vollmer
list.title: Power Factory Growth and Power Leader
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Power Platform & the John Deere Dealer Experience - Making the Most of Low Code
sessions.desc:
This session is presented by Accenture and Avanade 
 How does John Deere drive innovation across its vast network of independent dealerships? In this panel, leaders from Accenture and John Deere reveal how Microsoft Power Platform is reshaping dealer operations—boosting agility, enabling tailored solutions, and maintaining enterprise-grade governance. Whether you're leading digital transformation or scaling enterprise platforms, this session offers actionable insights from a high-performing ecosystem that’s delivering measurable impact.

list.name: Jen Johnson
list.title: Client Solutions Lead, Microsoft Applications – Industrial Equipment
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Unleashing the Future: Application Modernization through AI Native Engineering & Power Platform
sessions.desc: As technology reshapes every industry, the ability to adapt quickly with intelligence and agility has become a defining advantage. This session will explore how PwC is reimagining application modernization through the combined power of AI-native engineering and Microsoft Power Platform. We’ll showcase how organizations can unlock business outcomes by moving beyond copilots to agentic AI, leveraging automation, low-code development, and intelligent scale to deliver faster, smarter, and more cost-effective solutions. Through real-world examples, we’ll demonstrate how enterprises can reduce technical debt, accelerate innovation, and achieve measurable impact with AI-enabled delivery.      In this session you’ll learn:   •	How to move from copilots to agentic AI to accelerate business outcomes.   •	Practical strategies for reducing technical debt and modernizing applications at scale.   •	The role of Power Platform is driving low-code innovation, faster delivery, and lower costs.   •	How to embed AI-native engineering into delivery models to achieve speed, agility, and measurable impact.

list.name: Jason Massoglia
list.title: Partner at PwC, Cloud, Engineering, Data, Artificial Intelligence Microsoft Practice Partner
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Ice Cream Break
Confessions of a Power BI Dataviz Judge
sessions.desc: After judging countless Power BI dashboards, I’ve seen joy and nightmares. This candid, practical session unpacks the quiet UX/UI mistakes that tank impact: chaotic layouts, clashing colors, weak hierarchy. You’ll leave with simple rules (and when to break them) to design clean, clear dashboards that actually spark joy, plus a few laughs. No pie charts will be harmed (probably).     Key takeaways   Spot the most common UX/UI traps sabotaging Power BI reports   Apply quick fixes for alignment, spacing, color harmony, and accessibility   Know when to follow design rules—and when to bend them for effect

sessions.title: Power BI Performance Tips from the Experts
sessions.desc: Join us as we dive into the most common performance challenges customers face in Power BI. From report design best practices to optimizing your data, we’ll walk through real-world scenarios that can impact speed and efficiency. You’ll leave with practical tips, fresh insights, and a better understanding of how to get the most out of Power BI in your organization.

sessions.title: Custom MCP Servers: Unlock Enterprise Data from Anywhere for Smarter, Safer AI Agents
sessions.desc: Every business is different—and while out-of-the-box MCP servers like the Dataverse MCP offer a strong starting point, the real power comes from customizing them to fit your specific needs. In this session, learn how to tailor MCP servers by selecting only the tools you need, bringing in custom APIs, connector actions, flows, and prompts, and composing entirely new servers by reusing tools from others. New experiences for discovering and customizing MCP servers at both the tenant and environment level make it easy to build, manage, and operationalize these servers with enterprise-grade trust, governance, and reusability—powering agents across Copilot Studio, Claude, VS Code, and beyond.

sessions.title: Unleash Productivity for Agents with Advanced and Real-Time Knowledge, Actions, and AI Prompts
sessions.desc: Unlock the full potential of your enterprise's systems, documents, and real-time business app data to supercharge your conversational and autonomous business agents, driving unprecedented productivity! Join us for an insightful session where you'll discover how to harness the power of Copilot Studio, integrate real-time knowledge from SaaS services like Dataverse, Fabric, Salesforce, and others, complement with AI document processing from shared mailbox emails, PDFs, and execute real-time MCP server actions seamlessly. Furthermore, learn how to craft & integrate effective AI prompts along with additional techniques that will catapult your organization into the forefront of AI-powered business innovation.

sessions.title: Building Smarter Agents and Apps with Dataverse Knowledge
sessions.desc: As AI agents become more embedded in daily workflows, their ability to reason over enterprise knowledge—both structured and unstructured—is critical. In this session, discover how the latest innovations in Copilot Studio Knowledge, including file groups and unified retrieval, empowering you to turn your existing content into intelligent, responsive agents. Learn how to seamlessly connect knowledge from SharePoint, OneDrive, Dataverse, and more. Whether you're a low-code maker or an IT pro, you'll walk away with practical guidance on how to make your agents smarter, faster, and enterprise-ready.

list.name: Jason Huang
list.title: Senior Product Manager, BIC AGENT CLOUD
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Transform Your Agent’s Office Productivity with Microsoft’s MCP Servers
sessions.desc: Discover how Microsoft’s MCP servers can dramatically improve the efficiency and intelligence of your existing or newly built agents and solutions. This session will showcase how Microsoft-powered MCP servers enable smarter, faster, and more scalable Office productivity experiences. Learn how these innovations can help your organization unlock deeper insights, reduce manual effort, and accelerate business outcomes.

list.name: Srikumar Nair
list.title: Principal Group Product Manager, Microsoft Dataverse team
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Resilient by Design: Always-on Agents with Self-Service Disaster Recovery and Hyper Availability
sessions.desc: As Al agents increasingly drive critical workflows in business -- from frontline operations to executive decision-making -- continuous availability and resilience are no longer optional. In today’s hyper-connected world, downtime means disruption. That’s why Microsoft has reimagined disaster recovery and reliability for the AI age.    In this session, we'll introduce how agents on Microsoft Power Platform gain Self-Serve Disaster Recovery and Hyper Availability -- a comprehensive set of capabilities engineered to deliver seamless failover and resilience by design along with enterprise-grade uptime. Whether you are powering intelligent agents with Copilot Studio, automating global supply chains , or delivering personalized healthcare experiences, this platform ensures your mission-critical workloads are self-healing, fail-safe, and disaster-proof.    You’ll see how innovations like synchronous replication across Azure Availability Zones, self-service cross-region disaster recovery, and intelligent failover for AI-powered agents enable mission-critical continuity. Plus, we’ll share how Microsoft is dogfooding these capabilities internally and delivering resilience at scale, giving you the confidence to innovate without compromise.

sessions.title: Be an Agent Boss: Direct, Supervise, and Upskill Agents with Power Apps
sessions.desc: Transform your apps from the place you do work to the place you oversee it. In this demo-packed session, learn how to assign in-app agents to fill forms, explore data, and automate repetitive tasks. Discover how to supervise agent activity, manage escalations, and give human-in-the-loop input with the agent feed. Use teaching mode to boost model accuracy, customize behaviors, and continuously tune performance. Leave with practical patterns and tips you can use immediately to empower your organization to work faster and smarter.

sessions.title: Build Apps with Generative Pages
sessions.desc: Learn how to extend model-driven apps with generative pages—custom user experiences created from natural language. In this session, we’ll show you how to go from a blank canvas to a fully functional app page in minutes. Discover best practices to build prompts for generating intuitive and responsive pages in Power Apps. You’ll leave with practical strategies to accelerate app development and boost user productivity.

sessions.title: The Hub for Human-Agent Collaboration: Agent Feed in Power Apps
sessions.desc: The way we work is changing. As AI agents become true collaborators in business-critical processes, users need more than automations and prompts; they need intelligent, integrated workspaces to manage this new kind of teamwork. Join us to explore Agent Feed in Power Apps, a powerful new workspace built for human-agent collaboration. Discover how business users can stay in sync with agent activity, get real-time guidance to make timely decisions, and trigger intelligent actions directly in context. Whether you're streamlining operations or scaling service delivery, you'll learn how to unlock productivity and control with your team of AI agents.

sessions.title: Working with a Team of Agents to Modernize Your Solution
sessions.desc: Explore the latest innovations in Power Apps plans, including new capabilities that streamline planning workflows, enhance data integration, and improve user experience across Power Platform. This session will showcase end-to-end scenarios that demonstrate how new features can be used to upgrade existing solutions or build new ones from scratch.

sessions.title: Copilot Studio Cost Controls and Licensing
sessions.desc: As AI agents scale across your organization, so does the need for clear, actionable cost governance. In this session, we’ll explore how Copilot Studio empowers IT admins and business leaders to track, manage, and forecast agent usage with precision. You’ll get a deep dive into the latest cost control capabilities across Microsoft 365 Admin Center and Power Platform Admin Center—including departmental billing policies, budget enforcement, and real-time analytics. Learn how to configure Pay-as-you-go (PAYG) billing, allocate prepaid message packs, and apply agent-level usage limits to ensure financial discipline without stifling innovation. We’ll also introduce the new Agent Message Usage Estimator—a powerful tool to help you forecast message consumption based on your agent’s configuration and usage patterns. Whether you're just getting started or scaling enterprise-wide, this session will equip you with the tools and insights to confidently manage agent costs and drive responsible AI adoption.

list.name: Kendra Springer
list.title: Principal Design Lead for Copilot Studio and Conversational AI
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Build to Brilliance: Elevate your Agents with Microsoft MCP Servers and Evals
sessions.desc: We are bringing productivity APIs into M365 Agent SDK through curated agent-friendly MCP servers that work across the office ecosystem. You can build your pro code agent that uses agent identity to send an email , synthesize a question and reply to a comment in a document !Watch us as we show you how to use the same MCP servers across agents in MCS and Foundry.

sessions.title: Power Pages State of the Union: AI Agents Transforming Website Creation and Experiences
sessions.desc: Join us in this action-packed session to learn the latest on how AI is driving the next wave of innovation in Power Pages! Discover how AI agents on Power Pages are revolutionizing creation of websites, UX, business logic and backend integrations. Learn how customers are using Power Pages to ship high scale business portals to accelerate and improve customer interaction and customer experience, helping accelerate business processes.

list.name: Dipti Jaiswal
list.title: Partner Group Eng Manager, Microsoft Power Pages
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Next-Gen Mobile Apps on Power Platform for Frontline Workers: Offline, Branded, and AI-Powered
sessions.desc: Frontline workers are the engine which drives much of economy in the physical world. Power Apps Mobile is driving these experiences across a wide array of use cases. Come to this session to learn how you can use Power Apps to drive better and more efficient experiences from your frontline workers. We will have a special customer in this session to share their experience in detail.

sessions.title: Building with Plans in Power Platform: What's New and What's to Come
sessions.desc: In this a detailed end to end demo-based session you'll see how plans are helping developers build comprehensive agentic solutions. We will also cover what's coming as we embark on the next step for plans and generative apps. Connect with the Microsoft product team to understand what is changing, what the direction is, and get answers to your questions direct from the team.

list.name: Simon Matthews
list.title: Principal GPM, Power Platform Developer Agents
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Build apps and generate code right in Power Apps
sessions.desc: Learn about the latest agent in building apps with agents. You can now build apps for personal and team productivity directly Take any idea, and build a rich app within minutes. Power Apps enables you to leverage your enterprise data and build apps from your files, emails, and meeting data in M365. Come and connect with the product team to here about how you can get hands on today, and what's in our roadmap.

list.name: Clay Wesener
list.title: Partner Group Product Manager, Power Apps Studio
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Power BI Roadmap: Strategy, Vision, and Demos
sessions.desc: Power BI empowers every organization to meet the most demanding modern enterprise needs. As a foundational part of Microsoft Fabric, Power BI is transforming how analytics projects are delivered.    Understand why customers large and small are standardizing on Power BI. In this session you will hear about the Power BI strategy, building a data culture in your organization, and how to turn insights into action.    Get a glimpse into the future of Power BI with exclusive sneak peeks of upcoming features to help you harness the full potential of your data.

sessions.title: Unify Your Data Estate with OneLake, the OneDrive for Data
sessions.desc: OneLake, within Microsoft Fabric, provides a single, unified storage system for all developers and eliminates pervasive and chaotic data silos created by users configuring their own isolated storage.    Unifying data across an organization and clouds becomes trivial. With the OneLake catalog, users can easily explore and discover data to reuse, manage or gain insights. And with business domains, different business units can work independently in a data mesh pattern, without the overhead of maintaining separate lakes.

sessions.title: Architecture Internals
sessions.desc: Power Platform Architecture Internals is a continuation of the 2022, 2023, and 2024 PPCC sessions about the internals of Business Applications and the Power Platform. We will discuss the high-level design with a focus on High Availability and Disaster Recovery of the platform. We will explore how the Power Platform teams has invested in a cell-based architecture, resource governance, fault injections and safe deployment practices to make platform resilient to faults. Additionally, we will explore how the Power Platform leverages Microsoft Azure for better resource isolation, improved performance, and global scalability.

list.name: Ilya Grebnov
list.title: Vice President and Deputy CTO, BIC
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Dataverse + Fabric Unleashed: From Sub‑5m Analytics to Retention That Lasts
sessions.desc: Discover how Dataverse and Microsoft Fabric work together to deliver instant analytics and long-term value. Learn about some upcoming features around how to enable sub‑5 minutes Link to Fabric, leverage Mirrored Dataverse with table selection, and keep historical data queryable and cost‑efficient with Long‑Term Retention. This session will show you how to go from real-time insights to sustainable governance—all without complex pipelines. Expect practical patterns and a glimpse of what’s next.

list.name: Anirudha Bakore
list.title: Principal product manager at Microsoft Dataverse team.
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Dataverse, Your Enterprise Agent-Database
sessions.desc: Dataverse powers agentic workflows by enabling seamless collaboration between humans and agents. As the enterprise-grade database behind Copilot Studio, it supports triggers, actions, and contextual knowledge for building responsive agents. Learn how to structure data, enable human-in-the-loop workflows, and orchestrate collaboration using Power Platform and Dataverse MCP.

sessions.title: Unleashing the power of Business Data with Dataverse MCP Server
sessions.desc: As AI agents perform more and more operations and blend into your regular workflows, these agents need easy access to your business data. The Dataverse MCP server transforms the way you create, access, manage and act on your data. In this demo heavy session, we'll explore what's possible when your data becomes instantly accessible to intelligent agents and solutions inside Copilot Studio - without the heavy lifting.

sessions.title: Agentic Automation for Documents, Email, and Knowledge

This is your opportunity to see what’s possible, ask questions in the moment, and take away practical insights to accelerate your own intelligent app journey.

sessions.title: Next-Gen Automation in Copilot Studio: Unlocking Autonomous Agents, Agent Flows & Computer Use Agent
sessions.desc: Copilot Studio is redefining automation with a powerful blend of generative AI and structured orchestration. In this session, explore the next generation of automation patterns—starting with autonomous agents that reason across knowledge and tools. Learn how to design scalable, modular logic with Agent Flows, and see how Computer Use Agents (CUAs) bridge the gap between your copilots and legacy systems. You’ll also discover how to apply Responsible AI patterns to maintain oversight and control, ensuring safe autonomy. Join us to unlock the full potential of AI-driven automation in Copilot Studio.

list.name: Petros Feleskouras
list.title: Program Manager 2 – Power CAT, Copilot Studio
list.label: Speaker

sessions.title: Power Platform - Empowering the People that Power the World
sessions.desc: Discover how leading organizations in the Oil & Gas and Electric Utilities sectors are revolutionizing their operations with Microsoft Power Platform and Azure AI. This session showcases compelling case studies highlighting innovative business solutions built using PowerApps, Copilot Studio, and Azure AI. Attendees will explore how Oil & Gas companies have streamlined asset management, enhanced field operations, and improved safety compliance through custom PowerApps integrated with real-time data and AI-driven insights. Similarly, Electric Utilities have leveraged Copilot Studio to automate customer service workflows, optimize grid maintenance, and drive predictive analytics for outage prevention. Learn how these industries harness Azure AI to unlock advanced analytics, enabling smarter decision-making and operational efficiency. Through real-world examples, this session will demonstrate practical applications, key challenges overcome, and measurable business outcomes. Attendees will gain actionable insights into building scalable, low-code solutions tailored to energy sector needs, empowering their organizations to accelerate digital transformation. Ideal for business leaders, IT professionals, and developers seeking to drive innovation in energy.

sessions.title: Power Platform and Copilot in Dynamics 365 Business Central – Now and Future
sessions.desc: Join members of the Microsoft Business Central engineering team for a discussion around how small and medium-sized businesses can harness the power of Copilot, Copilot Studio agents, and Power Platform to transform their operations now and in the future. This roundtable is intended for Business Central customers, partners and prospects to connect with the engineering team, share feedback and discuss roadmap. We will cover all aspects of Power Platform integration, the built-in Copilot experiences, preconfigured and custom agents, and AI-driven automation. Expect practical tips, answers to your questions and a platform to provide feedback on the roadmap.

sessions.title: Power Platform in the Era of AI: The Business Value Multiplier
sessions.desc: In this session, we’ll explore how Power Platform powered by AI is fundamentally amplifying the business value organisations can achieve, reshaping not only what we build, but how we build it.   Building on themes from last year’s discussion on driving adoption through business value, we’ll examine how to measure impact in ways that resonate with business stakeholders and can be quantified and tracked through process metrics.br>  Real-world examples and a practical framework will help participants connect AI investments to tangible business outcomes, ensuring automation strategies deliver measurable value where it matters most.

sessions.title: Powering Public Impact: A Roundtable on Power Platform in Government
sessions.desc: Join peers from across Federal, State, and Local Government and higher Education - both within the US and abroad - to explore how the Power Platform is transforming public service delivery.  This interactive roundtable invites participants to share challenges, success stories, and ideas for scaling low-code innovation in regulated environments. Topics include governance, security, citizen engagement, and AI adoption in the public sector.

sessions.title: Retail, Reprogrammed
sessions.desc: Retail is being rewritten on the frontier of innovation. In this interactive session, we’ll explore real-world stories from retailers who’ve harnessed intelligent automation to transform operations and reimagine customer experiences—from the back office to the sales floor. Discover how AI-powered experiences are driving efficiency behind the scenes, creating standout moments at the edge of the consumer journey, and setting the stage for the next era of retail.

sessions.title: SAP & Power Platform: Technical Considerations
sessions.desc: Join us for a focused technical session exploring the integration of SAP with Microsoft Power Platform, where we’ll unpack key architectural considerations, integration strategies, and real-world implementation patterns. Special emphasis will be placed on Copilot Studio - how agentic experiences can streamline workflows, enhance automation, and intelligently bridge SAP data with low-code solutions. Whether you're designing scalable solutions or deploying AI-powered agents, this session will equip you with actionable insights to drive innovation across SAP.

sessions.title: Supercharging Apps with Agents – Driving Productivity and Efficiency
sessions.desc: Join us for an interactive roundtable where Power CAT Solution Architects and customers will explore how to unlock new levels of productivity by embedding Agents directly into Dataverse-backed applications—always with full user oversight.    In this session, you’ll:    Discuss real-world scenarios where adding Agents to applications streamlines workflows and empowers users.  See how intelligent Agents can be safely integrated to guide, automate, and assist without removing human control.  Collaborate on design patterns that balance efficiency gains with trust, transparency, and governance.  Share best practices and lessons from early adopters who are using Agents to enhance customer and employee experiences.  This roundtable is a chance to learn, co-create, and walk away with practical insights on how to make your applications smarter, safer, and more efficient with Agents.

sessions.title: Top Agent Security Issues: Share, Learn, and Collaborate
sessions.desc: Help us shape security systems for the coming agentic future! In this interactive session, we'll listen to attendees' experiences and solutions to agent-building security challenges. Together, we'll explore how we can enhance security interactions and systems.

sessions.title: Unlock Automation Success – Best Practices for Migrating to Power Automate for RPA
sessions.desc: Join us for an interactive session exploring real-world customer journeys before, during, and after migrating to Power Automate for RPA.    Discover firsthand insights, proven best practices, and essential resources that can help you kickstart your automation transformation with confidence and speed. Whether you're planning your migration or already underway, this session will equip you with practical guidance to accelerate success.

sessions.title: Turn AI Vision into Reality: CAPE Copilot Programs That Deliver Results
sessions.desc: Join us in this dynamic roundtable with the Microsoft Engineering team to explore your next steps toward M365 Copilot and agents success and discover which Microsoft programs can help you achieve those goals. Whether you’re just getting started or ready to scale, we’ll guide you through the most common themes, with CAPE sharing best practices and guidance including agent Quick Starts, building an Agent COEs and much more such as  - How do you engage an executive sponsor, and what should you prioritize over the next 6 months?  - How do you measure the true value of agents to your organization?  - How can you confidently deploy enterprise agents leveraging Microsoft’s experience?  - What should your organization’s AI skilling plan look like—is there a proven framework to follow?  - What roadmap will help your organization move from experimentation to full transformation?    Hear success stories from others on this journey and learn which Microsoft Customer Advisory Team programs can help you overcome roadblocks, spark innovation, and fast-track your Copilot journey.

sessions.title: Unlocking Innovation in Insurance with Power Platform
sessions.desc: Join industry leaders and peers from across the insurance industry—spanning carriers, brokers, reinsurers, and regulators—to explore how Microsoft Power Platform is reshaping the future of insurance.    This session features real-world stories and insights directly from leading organizations that are transforming their operations and customer experiences using Power Platform. Speakers from industry voices at prominent insurers and service providers will share firsthand how they’ve tackled challenges, accelerated innovation, and delivered measurable impact. Through practical examples and experiences, you'll gain insights into how low-code tools are driving agility, streamlining workflows, and empowering teams across the insurance value chain. Discover how organization are driving customer engagement and integrating AI to streamline operations and deliver exceptional service in highly regulated environments.    Whether you're in insurance, healthcare, manufacturing, retail-or any other sector-if you're just starting your Power Platform journey or leading enterprise-wide transformation, this session offers valuable insights and connections to accelerate your impact.

sessions.title: What’s Worth Automating? A Roundtable on ROI in Agentic Automation
sessions.desc: If your organization is trying to decide which business processes to optimize with agentic automation, you're not alone. In this interactive, no-laptops-needed roundtable, we'll explore how teams are thinking about automation ROI - from direct cost savings to less obvious (but powerful) benefits like risk reduction, error prevention, and employee or customer experience. Discussion will cover topics like how you determine which business processes to consider for automation, how you assess the current cost or pain of those processes, how you define return on investment (beyond just dollars), and how value is communicated internally to drive buy-in.    This is an open, collaborative session, not a lecture or tool walk-through. You'll leave with new ways to think about value, and we'll gain a better understanding of customer needs and how to build tools that support your priorities.

Join    Kim       Manis   , Corporate Vice President of Product, as she explores what’s new in Microsoft Fabric and Power BI. We'll discuss what this democratization of "making "means for professional builders and IT admins.
